original_text: Jesus then said, ‘I will tell you a story to show what the kingdom of heaven is like. A king wanted to check how much money his servants should give to him because of their debts.
korean_text: 그러므로 천국은 그 종들과 결산하려 하던 어떤 임금과 같으니

sentences.original_text: to show what the kingdom of heaven is like
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘 나라가 어떤 것인지 보여주기 위해서다

sentences.original_text: how much money his servants should give to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 종들이 얼마를 그에게 주어야 하는지
